org.encog.ml.model.config

Class FeedforwardConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encog.ml.model.config.FeedforwardConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodConfig

    public class FeedforwardConfig
extends Object
implements MethodConfig
    Config class for EncogModel to use a feedforward neural network.
